fields.Title of Presentation: The When and How of Effective Game-based Learning and Gamification
fields.Description/Abstract: <span>Game</span>-<span>based</span><span> </span>learning and gamification can increase engagement, improve problem-solving skills, and foster critical thinking. However, these approaches can also be costly and complex to implement. In this session, you will learn about the cost, effort required, and benefits of<span> </span><span>game</span>-<span>based</span><span> </span>learning and gamification in training. The session will cover different development and implementation strategies<span> </span><span>based</span><span> </span>on distinct needs and intended outcomes.
